original_text: and the master of the banquet tasted the water that had been turned into wine. He did not realize where it had come from, though the servants who had drawn the water knew. Then he called the bridegroom aside
korean_text: 연회장은 물로 된 포도주를 맛보고도 어디서 났는지 알지 못하되 물 떠온 하인들은 알더라 연회장이 신랑을 불러

sentences.original_text: and master of the banquet tasted the water
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 연회의 주인은 그 물을 맛보았습니다

sentences.original_text: that had been turned into wine
He did not realize where it had come from
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 그것이 어디서 왔는지 깨닫지 못했습니다

sentences.original_text: though the servants who had drawn the water knew
Then he called the bridegroom aside
